Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class JoinMenuController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.JoinMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class JoinMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the JoinMenu.fxml stage. The Client in this stage has the chance to choose a Session to join.

    static void display​(SessionListMessage msg)

    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    MainController notifies a PlayerRetrieveSessions and an ExecutorService will be used to updates every seconds the Session list so a Player cannpt join an already started Game.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public static void setMainController​(MainController mc)

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      MainController notifies a PlayerRetrieveSessions and an ExecutorService will be used to updates every seconds the Session list so a Player cannpt join an already started Game.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • handleBack

      public void handleBack() throws java.io.IOException
      Method loads a different FXML resource and create a new stage that will replace the current one, the Player will return to the Start Menu stage.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • handleJoin

      public void handleJoin() throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to join a Session. The MainController notifies a PlayerSelectSession Message.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • handleStart

      public void handleStart()
      When the MainController receives a SuccessfulJoin Message the Player will be redirected to a WaitController stage.

    • handleException

      public void handleException​(java.lang.Exception e)
      If MainController receives a InvalidUsernameException this method will handle the exception asking the Player to re-insert a valid username. If MainController receives a SessionNotExistsException the stage will be reloaded via 'reload' method. This exception can occur in case the Player tries to join a Session.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • reload

      private void reload()
      Reloads the stage.

    • display

      public static void display​(SessionListMessage msg)
      When MainController receives a SessionListMessage this method will parse the data and fill the Session table.
      Parameters:
      msg -

    • getSessionNames

      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSessionNames()
      Method to retrieve Session names retrieved by SessionListMessage.
      Returns:
      names

    • handleRefresh

      private void handleRefresh()
      Method used by the ExecutorService executor. The MainController notifies a PlayerRetrieveSessions.
